title: The Neighbour’s Cat: A Short Story
description: Hello, my name is Theodore. The first thing you should know about me is that I’m a cat. I’m what humans call a tuxedo cat. The second thing you should know about me is that my owner hurts women. In the period of five years that I have been his pet, he has killed four women, and he’s on the lookout for the next victim. And he has found her.The novel version of this book will be published on the 3rd of November you can add it here https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5...
author: J.S. Ellis
